author: Jason Murdock
title: Florida Man Places Fake 'Infected with Covid-19' Sign on His Door to Evade Police, Gets Arrested
description: Joshua Price, in his 20s, was detained by officers from the Putnam County Sheriff's Office, who said they wore protective gear to make the arrest. He did not show symptoms of the infections disease.
content:
A Florida man took a novel approach in an unsuccessful attempt to evade arrest this week: sticking a handwritten sign to his door that claimed he was infected with COVID-19.
Joshua Price, in his 20s, was detained by officers from the Putnam County Sheriff's … [+5200 chars]
